main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 29 March 1955 in Pendleton, Oregon, classified as a 'Probable Balloon.'
interesting points: The sighting involved 2 visible objects with 3 separate flashes lasting approximately 2 minutes., Flight speeds were approximately 4500 M.P.H., The objects were light orange in color with no visible trail or propulsion system., The objects disappeared to the north in straight level flight., Observation lasted for 2 minutes and was conducted from the ground.
